target_name: 2020년까지, 도로교통사고로 인한 사망자 및 부상자 수를 절반으로 감소

en.target_name: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Death rate due to road traffic injuries
en.data_name: Deaths due to road traffic injuries
en.indicator_definition: The number of deaths attributed to road traffic injuries as defined in Article 2 of the Road Traffic Act
en.statistics_name: Road traffic accident reports received by the police
en.computation_calculations: Compiling statistics based on the police road traffic accident investigation reports(Traffic accident statistical graphs)
en.global_indicator_name: Death rate due to road traffic injuries
en.graph_title: Deaths due to road traffic injuries
en.source_organisation_1: Road Safety Department, National Police Agency
en.title: Untitled
